Name: Death Certificate
Description: Official document issued by the government certifying the person's death.

Name: Burial Permit
Description: Permit issued by authorities allowing the burial of a deceased person.

Name: Cremation Authorization
Description: Authorization form required to cremate a deceased person.

Name: Funeral Service Agreement
Description: Agreement outlining the terms and services for the funeral event.

Name: ID Copy
Description: Copy of the deceased or next of kin's identification document.

Name: Passport
Description: Official passport document of the deceased or next of kin.

Name: Insurance Policy
Description: Insurance policy document related to the funeral arrangement.
